trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the encryption algorithm used for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 封裝 XML 加密所用的加密演算法。

trans-unit.source: The `<EncryptionMethod>` tag uses a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to identify the encryption algorithm that must be used to decrypt XML data.
trans-unit.target: `<EncryptionMethod>`標記使用統一資源識別元 (URI) 來識別必須用來解密 XML 資料的加密演算法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> class encapsulates the `<EncryptionMethod>` tag defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod>類別會封裝`<EncryptionMethod>`全球資訊網協會 XML 加密規格所定義的標籤位於http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> class to identify the encryption algorithm associated with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> element or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod>類別，可識別與相關聯的加密演算法<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>項目或<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>項目。

trans-unit.source: Use one of the URI identifiers defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: 使用其中一個全球資訊網協會 XML 加密規格所定義的 URI 識別碼位於http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。

trans-unit.source: All URI identifiers are accessible as static fields of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.
trans-unit.target: 所有的 URI 識別碼是可存取的靜態欄位<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple utility class that uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES> algorithm to encrypt an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立簡單的公用程式類別，使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES>演算法來加密 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using a symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何加密使用對稱金鑰的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: This example does not include any key information in the encrypted XML document.
trans-unit.target: 此範例不包含任何金鑰資訊加密的 XML 文件中。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> class without specifying the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of an encryption algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod>類別，而不指定加密演算法的統一資源識別元 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> class specifying an algorithm Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> 類別的新執行個體，其指定演算法統一資源識別元 (URI)。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> class using the URI of an encryption algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod>類別使用的加密演算法的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Use one of the URI identifiers defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: 使用其中一個全球資訊網協會 XML 加密規格所定義的 URI 識別碼位於http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。

trans-unit.source: All URI identifiers are accessible as static fields of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.
trans-unit.target: 所有的 URI 識別碼是可存取的靜態欄位<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple utility class that uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES> algorithm to encrypt an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立簡單的公用程式類別，使用<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES>演算法來加密 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using a symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何加密使用對稱金鑰的 XML 文件。

trans-unit.source: This example does not include any key information in the encrypted XML document.
trans-unit.target: 此範例不包含任何金鑰資訊加密的 XML 文件中。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object that encapsulates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> 物件，封裝 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object that encapsulates an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> 物件，封裝 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> 類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.GetXml%2A> method returns a representation of the `<EncryptionMethod>` element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.GetXml%2A>方法會傳回表示`<EncryptionMethod>`項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the algorithm to use for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定統一資源識別元 (URI)，描述 XML 加密時所用的演算法。

trans-unit.source: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the algorithm to use for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 統一資源識別元 (URI)，描述 XML 加密時所用的演算法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.KeyAlgorithm%2A> property describes the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the encryption algorithm used to encrypt data associated with either the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> element or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.KeyAlgorithm%2A>屬性會描述用來加密資料與相關聯的加密演算法的統一資源識別元 (URI)<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>項目或<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>項目。

trans-unit.source: Use one of the URI identifiers defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
trans-unit.target: 使用其中一個全球資訊網協會 XML 加密規格所定義的 URI 識別碼位於http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/。

trans-unit.source: All URI identifiers are accessible as static fields of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.
trans-unit.target: 所有的 URI 識別碼是可存取的靜態欄位<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the algorithm key size used for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 XML 加密時所用的演算法金鑰大小。

trans-unit.source: The algorithm key size, in bits, used for XML encryption.
trans-unit.target: XML 加密時所用的演算法金鑰大小，以位元為單位。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.KeySize%2A> property describes the key size of the encryption algorithm used to encrypt data associated with either the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> element or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.KeySize%2A>屬性會描述用來加密資料與相關聯的加密演算法的金鑰大小<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData>項目或<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey>項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.KeySize" /> property was set to a value that was less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.KeySize" /> 屬性會設定為小於 0 的值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object to parse.
trans-unit.target: 要剖析的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> object and configures the internal state of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> object to match.
trans-unit.target: 剖析指定的 <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlElement" /> 物件，並設定 <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod" /> 物件的內部狀態來對應。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.LoadXml%2A> method configures the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> object to match the state of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.LoadXml%2A>方法會設定<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod>要符合的狀態物件<xref:System.Xml.XmlElement>物件。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="value" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The key size expressed in the <paramref name="value" /> parameter was less than 0.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> 參數中所表示的金鑰大小小於 0。
